verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H935>"Come<s%> with all of your <S%H1004>household<s%> into the <S%H8392>ship,<s%> for I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> your <S%H6662>righteousness<s%> before <S%H6440>me<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> seven pairs of every <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>animal<s%> with <S%H376>you,<s%> the male and his <S%H802>female.<s%> Of the <S%H929>animals<s%> that are not <S%H2889>clean,<s%> take <S%H8147>two,<s%> the <S%H376>male<s%> and his <S%H802>female.<s%>

Also of the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> and <S%H2145>seven,<s%> male and <S%H5347>female,<s%> to <S%H2421>keep<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H5750>In<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> I will cause it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> for <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights.<s%> <S%H3605>Every<s%> living <S%H3351>thing<s%> that I have <S%H6213>made,<s%> I will <S%H4229>destroy<s%> from the surface of the <S%H6440>ground.<s%>"
<S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> everything that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> commanded <S%H6680>him.<s%>
<S%H5146>Noah<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when the <S%H3999>flood<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> came on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H5146>Noah<s%> went into the <S%H8392>ship<s%> with his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H802>wives,<s%> because <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H3999>flood.<s%>
<S%H2889>Clean<s%> <S%H2889>animals,<s%> animals that are not clean, <S%H5775>birds,<s%> and everything that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H127>ground<s%>

<S%H935>went<s%> <S%H8147>by<s%> <S%H8147>pairs<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah<s%> into the <S%H8392>ship,<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5146>Noah.<s%>
It happened after the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3999>flood<s%> came on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H8141>In<s%> the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundredth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%>'s <S%H2416>life,<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H7651>seventeenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> all the <S%H4599>fountains<s%> of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8415>deep<s%> were burst <S%H1234>open,<s%> and the <S%H8064>sky<s%>'s <S%H699>windows<s%> were <S%H6605>opened.<s%>
The <S%H1653>rain<s%> was on the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights.<s%>

In the <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> and <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> and <S%H5146>Noah<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> and the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with <S%H8392>them,<s%> entered into the ship;

<S%H1992>they,<s%> and every <S%H2416>animal<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind,<s%> all the <S%H929>livestock<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> every creeping <S%H7431>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and every <S%H5775>bird<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind,<s%> every <S%H6833>bird<s%> of every <S%H3671>sort.<s%>

They went to <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H935>into<s%> the <S%H8392>ship,<s%> <S%H8147>by<s%> <S%H8147>pairs<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H834>with<s%> the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of life in <S%H2416>them.<s%>

Those who went <S%H935>in,<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> as <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3068>him;<s%> and Yahweh shut him <S%H5462>in.<s%>

The <S%H3999>flood<s%> was <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%> The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7235>increased,<s%> and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H8392>ship,<s%> and it was lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> above the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed,<s%> and <S%H7235>increased<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> on the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and the ship <S%H3212>floated<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%> All the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%> that were <S%H8478>under<s%> the whole <S%H8064>sky<s%> were <S%H3680>covered.<s%>
The <S%H4325>waters<s%> prevailed <S%H6240>fifteen<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H4605>upward,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H3680>covered.<s%>

All <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H1478>died<s%> that <S%H7430>moved<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> including <S%H5775>birds,<s%> <S%H929>livestock,<s%> <S%H2416>animals,<s%> every creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H8317>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and every <S%H120>man.<s%>
All in whose <S%H639>nostrils<s%> was the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of the spirit of <S%H2416>life,<s%> of all that was on the <S%H2724>dry<s%> <S%H4191>land,<s%> died.

Every living <S%H3351>thing<s%> was <S%H4229>destroyed<s%> that was on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>ground,<s%> including <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H929>livestock,<s%> creeping <S%H7431>things,<s%> and <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky.<s%> They were <S%H4229>destroyed<s%> from the <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H389>Only<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> was <S%H7604>left,<s%> and those <S%H834>who<s%> were with him in the <S%H8392>ship.<s%>
The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
